Entries.Label: invalid-email
Entries.Text: Please enter a valid e-mail address

Entries.Label: unmatching-email
Entries.Text: Please make sure your e-mails are same

Entries.Label: invalid-password
Entries.Text:
Please enter a password with following rules:
* 8-25 character long
* Including upper and downcase letters
* Can also include this characters: @%+/!#$?*.-_

Entries.Label: existing-credentials
Entries.Text: This e-mail is already being used. Try logging in or try with another e-mail address

Entries.Label: connection-error
Entries.Text:
Connection error!
Please check your connection

Entries.Label: non-existing-email
Entries.Text: No account found related to this e-mail address

Entries.Label: invalid-chat-nick
Entries.Text: Please set your nick before sending messages
